description: Two figures are depicted in mid-air during a descent. One figure appears relatively stable, suspended by multiple lines. The other figure is flailing and screaming, notably wearing a helmet with a long spring culminating in a boxing glove extending upwards from his head. This surreal headgear introduces an element of absurd, self-inflicted peril into the already dangerous situation of falling, creating dark irony about bizarre choices in life-or-death scenarios. The contrast between the two individuals highlights the consequences of such eccentric preparation.
